mapper.select: SELECT PREV_IZ_SN , NEXT_IZ_SN , PD_CD , IZ_SN , APY_STRTDT , APY_ENDDT FROM ( SELECT LAG(IZ_SN) OVER (ORDER BY IZ_SN) AS PREV_IZ_SN , LEAD(IZ_SN) OVER (ORDER BY IZ_SN) AS NEXT_IZ_SN , PD_CD , IZ_SN , APY_STRTDT , APY_ENDDT FROM TB_SVPD_RCAS_BSTR_COST_BASE_IZ WHERE PD_CD = #{pdCd} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY IZ_SN ) WHERE IZ_SN = #{izSn}
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(IZ_SN)) FROM TB_SVPD_RCAS_BSTR_COST_BASE_IZ T WHERE T.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T.PD_CD = #{pdCd}
